description: this pu leather is designed with stylish grid patternIt supports smart cover capability: automatically wakes on open and sleeps on close, it also features a unique design with a 360 swivel that allows the iPad 2 to rotate in portrait or landscape position while in the case. The center of the swivel is open so that Apple logo is clearly exposed.Other key features:High quality polyurethane leather exterior with dual layer hard interior cover provides complete strong protection3 Convenient Stand Positions for easy typing and viewing moviesMicrofiber lining protects iPad screen from scratchFull access to all functions while in the caseEasy & quick installation: snap on left part of iPad 2, then rightother popular cases:black flower: search for 0I-QI5B-6VYDpink/white grid: B006G1O97Mwhite/gray grid: B006G1P0WAbrown grid: B006G1OIZ0
title: 360 Degree Rotating Stand Cover for Apple iPad 4th / the new iPad 3 / iPad 2 checkered Black and Grey
